properties.name: Lin Xiu
properties.health_status: Heterochromia (left eye golden, right eye brown)
properties.personality: Skilled in psychological manipulation, always wears a glove on the left hand

relationships.new_detail: Lin Xiu openly acknowledges Chen's investigative efforts and threatens direct confrontation
relationships.name: Chen Xiaodao
Su Mingyue
relationships.type: Debt relationship (Lin Xiu owes Su Mingyue a huge medical bill)

events.details: Chen directly asks about the technology and its connection to the ship's disappearance, causing Lin Xiu to reach for a concealed weapon
consequences: Lin Xiu reveals he has access to restricted systems
Su Mingyue confirms the equipment is for temporal manipulation

events.details: Experimental equipment activates unexpectedly, showing glimpses of past/future ship conditions before overloading
consequences: Reveals the ship exists in multiple time periods simultaneously

events.details: Lin Xiu flees to secure backup equipment, leading to a cat-and-mouse chase through maintenance corridors
consequences: Chen uses his knowledge of ship's layout to cut off Lin Xiu
Security cameras mysteriously fail during chase

events.details: Lin Xiu attempts to send a distress signal that distorts into twenty-year-old frequencies, confirming the ship's temporal displacement
consequences: Receives response from the ship's past self
Chen copies the transmission as evidence
